item.title: 重振 "蓝巨头 "的 IBM 前首席执行官路易斯-格斯特纳逝世，享年 83 岁
item.description: IBM 前首席执行官兼董事长路易斯-格斯特纳（Louis Gerstner）于上周六去世，享年 83 岁。【原文：Louis Gerstner, the former CEO and chairman of IBM , died on Saturday, aged 83.】

item.title: 报告称，越来越多的以色列科技工作者希望移居国外
item.description: 报告说，由于以色列对哈马斯发动了战争，在以色列开展业务的跨国公司的员工提出了更多的要求。【原文：Requests among staff at multinational companies operating in Israel rose in reaction to Israel's war against Hamas, the report said.】

item.title: 亚马逊终止在意大利的无人机送货计划
item.description: 亚马逊周日表示，它已决定不再继续推进在意大利使用无人机送货的计划，称虽然它与航空航天监管机构的合作取得了良好进展，但更广泛的商业监管问题并不支持该项目。【原文：Amazon said on Sunday it has decided not to pursue plans to deliver goods by drone in Italy, saying that while it had made good progress with aerospace regulators, broader business regulatory issues did not support the project.】

item.title: Coupang 创始人 Kim Bom 就数据泄露道歉并承诺赔偿
item.description: Coupang 董事长兼创始人 Kim Bom 在公司网站上发表声明称，他对客户信息泄露事件表示 "诚挚的歉意"，并承诺将尽快公布赔偿计划。【原文：Coupang chairman and founder Kim Bom said he "sincerely apologises" for the data leak of customer information and pledged to unveil a compensation plan as soon as possible, according to a statement posted on the company's website.】

item.title: 台积电称地震后部分设施已疏散
item.description: 全球最大的合约芯片制造商台积电周六表示，地震发生后，其总部所在的新竹科学园区的少数设施达到了疏散标准。【原文：TSMC , the world's largest contract chipmaker, said on Saturday that a small number of its facilities in the Hsinchu science park, where it is headquartered, reached evacuation criteria following an earthquake.】

item.title: Waymo 在旧金山的故障引发了人们对机器人出租车在危机中是否准备就绪的疑虑
item.description: 本月早些时候，旧金山发生大面积停电事故，导致 Waymo 自动驾驶汽车停滞不前并阻塞交通，这引发了人们对自动驾驶汽车运营商是否已做好应对地震和洪水等重大紧急情况的准备的担忧。【原文：A widespread power outage in San Francisco that led to Waymo robotaxis stalling and snarling traffic earlier this month has raised concerns about the readiness of autonomous vehicle operators to tackle major emergencies like earthquakes and floods.】

item.title: 中国发布规则草案，规范具有类人交互功能的人工智能
item.description: 中国网络监管机构周六发布了征求公众意见的规则草案，将加强对旨在模拟人类性格并让用户参与情感互动的人工智能服务的监管。【原文：China's cyber regulator on Saturday issued draft rules for public comment that would tighten oversight of artificial intelligence services designed to simulate human personalities and engage users in emotional interaction.】

item.title: 冬季风暴袭击美国东北部，扰乱航空旅行
item.description: 国家气象局在整个纽约州和康涅狄格州发布了冰风暴和冬季风暴警报。【原文：The National Weather Service posted ice storm and winter storm warnings throughout New York state and Connecticut.】

item.title: 中国修订航空法，规范无人机，加强安全规则
item.description: 据中国国家媒体周六报道，中国通过了一项修订后的法律，首次正式对无人驾驶飞机进行监管，此举将重塑中国快速增长的无人机和低空经济领域。【原文：China passed a revised law that for the first time formally regulates unmanned aircraft, a move set to reshape the country's fast-growing drone and low-altitude economy sectors, according to state media on Saturday.】

item.title: 巴西大型工会拒绝巴西国家石油公司结束罢工的提议
item.description: 巴西工会 Sindipetro-NF 是代表巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）工人的最大工会之一，该工会周五在一份声明中表示，拒绝了国营石油公司最近提出的结束长达 12 天罢工的建议。【原文：Brazilian union Sindipetro-NF, one of the largest representing Petrobras' workers, has rejected the most recent proposal by the state-run oil firm to end a 12-day-long strike, it said in a statement on Friday.】

item.title: 纽约将要求社交媒体平台显示心理健康警示
item.description: 纽约州州长凯西-霍楚尔（Kathy Hochul）周五宣布，根据一项新法律，无限滚动、自动播放和算法推送的社交媒体平台将被要求显示警告标签，说明其对年轻用户心理健康的潜在危害。【原文：Social media platforms with infinite scrolling, auto-play and algorithmic feeds will be required to display warning labels about their potential harm to young users’ mental health under a new law, New York Governor Kathy Hochul announced on Friday.】

item.title: 前 ULA 首席执行官托里-布鲁诺将加入蓝色起源公司
item.description: 杰夫-贝索斯（Jeff Bezos）创办的蓝色起源太空公司周五表示，前联合发射联盟（United Launch Alliance）首席执行官托里-布鲁诺（Tory Bruno）将加入蓝色起源公司担任总裁。【原文：Former United Launch Alliance CEO Tory Bruno will join Blue Origin as president, the Jeff Bezos–founded space company said Friday.】

item.title: 受东北部冬季风暴警告影响，美国航空公司取消 1,000 多个航班
item.description: 根据航班追踪网站 FlightAware 的数据，由于严重的冬季风暴警告，美国的航空公司在周五假日出行高峰期间取消或推迟了数千个航班。【原文：Airlines in the United States have canceled or delayed thousands of flights during peak holiday travel on Friday due to severe winter storm warnings, according to flight tracking website FlightAware.】

item.title: Atos 将向巴西 Semantix 出售拉丁美洲业务
item.description: 法国 IT 公司 Atos 周五表示，作为广泛重组计划的一部分，该公司签署了一项具有约束力的协议，将其拉丁美洲业务出售给巴西技术公司 Semantix。【原文：French IT company Atos said on Friday it signed a binding agreement to sell its Latin American operations to Brazilian tech company Semantix as part of a broad restructuring plan.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，塔吉特因销售额下滑面临激进投资者的压力
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周五援引知情人士的话报道称，塔吉特正面临着来自对冲基金 Toms Capital Investment Management 的压力，该基金已对该零售商进行了大量投资。【原文：Target is facing pressure from hedge fund Toms Capital Investment Management, which has made a significant investment in the retailer, the Financial Times reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 交易清淡，日元走软，交易员对干预风险保持警惕
item.description: 周五，日元兑美元走软，原因是投资者仍在关注为支撑日元而可能采取的干预措施。【原文：The Japanese yen softened against the greenback on Friday as investors remained on watch for potential intervention to shore up the currency, while the dollar dipped slightly against the euro in thin trading volumes.】

item.title: 中国放宽开发可重复使用火箭企业的 IPO 规则
item.description: 上海证券交易所周五表示，开发可重复使用商业火箭的中国公司将有机会在技术密集型的星交所市场进入首次公开发行股票的快车道，从而免除一些财务要求。【原文：Chinese companies developing reusable commercial rockets will have access to a fast lane for initial public offerings on the tech-heavy STAR market that exempts them from some financial requirements, the Shanghai Stock Exchange said on Friday.】

item.title: 圣诞节后交易清淡，期货价格低迷
item.description: 周五，美国股指期货在圣诞节后的清淡交易中平静运行，投资者押注更多的降息措施和强劲的企业盈利将推动市场在明年创下新高。【原文：U.S. stock index futures traded quietly in a light post-Christmas session on Friday, with investors betting on more interest rate cuts and strong corporate earnings to propel markets to fresh highs next year.】

item.title: 白银的交易方式，从股票到银币和银条
item.description: 受强劲的工业和投资需求、持续的供应短缺、白银最近被指定为美国的重要矿产，以及一轮势头强劲的买盘推动，白银上周五首次突破每盎司 75 美元。【原文：Silver surged past $75 an ounce for the first time on Friday, propelled by strong industrial and investment demand, persistent supply shortfalls, its recent designation as a U.S. critical mineral, and a wave of momentum-driven buying.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 标普500指数逼近7000点大关，投资者期待2025年强势期以乐观姿态收尾
item.description: 投资者期待美国股市在下周以高昂的姿态结束 2025 年，股市将达到创纪录的峰值，并接近进一步看涨的里程碑，为又一个强劲的一年画上句号。【原文：Investors are looking for the U.S. stock market to end 2025 on a high note next week, with equities at record peaks and nearing further bullish milestones to close out another strong year.】

item.title: 据国家媒体报道，Wingtech 董事长称必须收回对 Nexperia 的控制权
item.description: 据中国国有企业《上海证券报》周五报道，闻泰科技董事长杨沐表示，中国闻泰科技必须收回荷兰芯片制造商 Nexperia 的控制权。【原文：China's Wingtech Technology must take back control of Netherlands-based chipmaker Nexperia, Chinese state-owned Shanghai Securities News reported Wingtech's chairman Yang Mu as saying on Friday.】

item.title: 韩国指控 10 人涉嫌向中国 CXMT 泄露芯片技术
item.description: 韩国检察官以涉嫌向中国芯片制造商长鑫存储科技公司（CXMT）泄露存储芯片制造技术为由起诉了 10 人，当局称此案有助于为中国开发人工智能计算的关键部件--高带宽内存（HBM）铺平道路。【原文：South Korean prosecutors have indicted 10 people on suspicion of leaking memory chip manufacturing technology to Chinese chipmaker ChangXin Memory Technologies (CXMT), a case authorities say helped pave the way for China's development of high-bandwidth memory (HBM), a critical component for artificial intelligence computing.】

item.title: 白银跃过 75 美元，黄金和铂金等金属继续创下历史新高
item.description: 由于对美国降息的押注和地缘政治的不安刺激了投资者的需求，白银周五首次突破75美元大关，黄金和铂金也升至历史新高。【原文：Silver smashed through the $75 mark for the first time on Friday, with gold and platinum also rising to all-time highs, as bets on U.S. rate cuts and geopolitical jitters fueled investor demand.】

item.title: 亚洲股市升至六周高位；贵金属走势强劲
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市升至六周以来的最高点，贵金属涨势迅猛，丝毫没有回落的迹象，投资者试图以高位结束今年的投资，而日元走软使干预风险继续存在。【原文：Asian stocks rose to their highest in six weeks on Friday and a blistering rally in precious metals showed no signs of tempering as investors sought to close out the year on a high while a softer yen kept intervention risk in the fray.】

item.title: 现货白银延续涨势，首次触及每盎司 75 美元
item.description: 受强劲的工业和投资需求、库存收紧、地缘政治紧张局势和美国进一步降息预期的支撑，现货白银周五攀升至每盎司 75 美元。【原文：Spot silver climbed to $75 an ounce on Friday, supported by robust industrial and investment demand, tightening inventories, geopolitical tensions and expectations of further U.S. interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 国营媒体报道：中国启动风险投资基金，投资 "硬科技
item.description: 据国家广播公司中央电视台报道，中国周五启动了三支风险投资基金，投资于 "硬技术 "领域。【原文：China on Friday launched three venture capital funds to invest in "hard technology" areas, state broadcaster CCTV reported.】

item.title: 市场权衡委内瑞拉供应风险，石油上涨
item.description: 在美国下令加大对委内瑞拉石油运输的经济压力，并应尼日利亚政府的请求对尼日利亚西北部的伊斯兰国武装分子实施空袭之后，周五油价攀升。【原文：Oil prices climbed on Friday after the U.S. ordered increased economic pressure on Venezuelan oil shipments and carried out airstrikes against Islamic State militants in northwest Nigeria at the request of Nigeria's government.】

item.title: 中国称希望企业就 TikTok 交易寻求合法、平衡的解决方案
item.description: 中国商务部发言人周四在被问及 TikTok 移交美国业务一事时表示，中国政府希望看到企业达成符合中国法律法规、平衡各方利益的解决方案。【原文：The Chinese government would like to see companies reach solutions that comply with Chinese laws and regulations and balance the interests of all parties, a commerce ministry spokesperson said on Thursday when asked about the hand-over of TikTok's U.S. operations.】

item.title: CAICT数据显示，11月中国外资品牌手机出货量同比增长一倍多
item.description: 路透社根据一家隶属于政府的研究公司周四公布的数据计算得出的结果显示，包括苹果公司 iPhone 手机在内的外国品牌手机 11 月份在中国的出货量同比增长了 128.4%。【原文：Shipments of foreign-branded mobile phones, including Apple's iPhones, rose 128.4% in China in November from the same month last year, according to Reuters calculations based on data released by a government-affiliated research firm on Thursday.】

item.title: 民主党州长呼吁特朗普政府解除对海上风电项目的冻结
item.description: 四位民主党州长周三致信美国内政部长道格-伯格姆，要求特朗普政府取消对美国东海岸五个海上风电项目的禁令。【原文：Four Democratic governors wrote to U.S. Interior Secretary Doug Burgum on Wednesday to ask the Trump administration to lift its halt on five offshore wind projects on the U.S. East Coast.】
